slash.guildID: guild ID to use slash in guild

chatbotChannel: channel id to listen in chatbot

nick.guildID: guild id to change nickname on join
nick.nickname: nickname to change. use {user} to replace with username

ytNotifs.ytChannelId: youtube channel id to send notifications for
ytNotifs.notifsChannelId: id of channel to send notifications to
ytNotifs.notifMsg: message to send when new vid is uploaded, placeholders {author} and {url} can be used here
